### 21189-242004: Training Breach Doors

***Contract Information***
*Contract Reference Number*: WS4316801494-Doc4382781489
*Amendment Number*: 7
*Solicitation Number*: WS4316801494

***Publication Information***
*Publication Date*: January 10, 2024
*Tender Closing Date*: April 5, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*Amendment Date*: March 22, 2024
*Expected Contract Start Date*: April 1, 2024
*Expected Contract End Date*: None

***Tender Description***
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is issuing a request for proposals (RFP) for the supply and delivery of seven (7) freestanding breach training doors, to be installed at five (5) training sites across Canada.  This RFP seeks to secure a supplier that can provide the necessary doors and related equipment to support the CSC’s training requirements.

The CSC’s Learning and Development Branch is responsible for the development and delivery of training programs for its staff.  The training breaches doors are a critical component of these programs, as they are used to simulate scenarios that require emergency response and intervention.

***Supply Requirements***
The successful bidder will be required to provide the following:

* Seven (7) freestanding breach training doors
* The option to purchase up to 15 additional breach training doors throughout the period of the contract
* Doors with adjustable legs and detachable mounting platform

***Delivery Requirements***
The bidder must be able to deliver the breach training doors to five (5) training sites located across Canada.  The specific type, quantity, and delivery points will be determined by the CSC on a need-basis.

***Contract Terms and Conditions***
The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest-priced bid that meets the requirements of the RFP.  The contract will be governed by the standard contractual terms and conditions of the CSC.
